Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Establishes Three King's day as a school holiday for all public schools in a city having a population of one million or more inhabitants
Summary: Establishes Three King's day as a school holiday for all public schools in a city school district of a city having a population of one million or more inhabitants.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing Three King's day as a school holiday for all public schools in a city having a population of one million or more inhabitants
